name: Squadron Assignments
Lore: 'Rebel starfighter squadrons take great pride in their proficiency and dedication. Alliance pilots train relentlessly until man and machine function as one.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. During your deploy phase, you may reveal one unpiloted starfighter from hand to take its matching pilot character from Reserve Deck (or vice versa) and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)',
